DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect single dos midazolam plasma concentration single dose moxidectin healthy young adult subject , assess safety co-administration moxidectin midazolam .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating The Co-Administration Of Moxidectin And Midazolam In Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Men woman nonchildbearing potential ( WONCBP ) age 18 50 year inclusive screening . WONCBP may include either surgically sterile ( hysterectomy and/or oophorectomy ) postmenopausal ≥1 year ( folliclestimulating hormone [ FSH ] ≥38 mIU/mL ) must negative pregnancy test result within 48 hour administration test article . Women surgically sterile must provide documentation procedure operative report ultrasound . Sexually active men must agree use medically acceptable form contraception study continue 12 week test article administration . 2 . Body mass index range 18 30 kg/m2 body weight ≥50 kg . 3 . Healthy determine investigator basis screen evaluation . Exclusion criterion : 1 . Women childbearing potential . 2 . Presence history disorder may prevent successful completion study . 3 . Any significant cardiovascular , hepatic , renal , respiratory , gastrointestinal , endocrine , immunologic , dermatologic , hematologic , neurologic , psychiatric disease .
